name: Desert Troll
description: The Desert Troll is a large giant with excellent camouflage in desert terrains, characterized by its chaotic evil alignment and formidable stature.
memorable: Its ability to regenerate and water susceptibility make it both dangerous and vulnerable.
goals: To ambush and overpower unsuspecting prey in its desert habitat.
relations: May be encountered with other desert creatures or serve as a guardian to a desert lair.
strengths: Strong physical attributes, capable of significant melee damage and regaining health each turn.
weaknesses: Susceptible to water, which disrupts its regeneration ability.
attacks: Multiattack allowing one bite and two claw strikes, dealing consistent piercing and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration enables it to recover health at the start of each turn unless harmed by acid damage.
senses: Has darkvision and exceptional perception enhanced by its keen sense of smell.
skills: Proficient in stealth and perception, enhancing its ambush tactics.
additional_information: Gains advantage on stealth checks in desert areas due to Desert Camouflage.
Erupts from the ground to surprise foes with bludgeoning damage.
Possesses immunity to fire damage, making it resistant to fire-based attacks.
Requires strategy from opponents to use water against it effectively.
Displays excellent physical resilience with high hit points.
test_queries: chaotic evil giant that lives in deserts
ambush predator with keen smell ability
troll that can burrow and surprise foes
giant with water vulnerability in desert terrain
